nodes.bodyText: If not used I would remove ispn.server.*.path use
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -122,16 +127,16 @@ if $linux; then
     for var in $CONSOLIDATED_OPTS
     do
        # Remove quotes
-       p=$(echo $var | tr -d "'")
+       p=$(echo "$var" | tr -d "'")
        case $p in
-         -Dinfinispan.server.base.dir=*)

nodes.bodyText: There are some commands that reference those paths: user, credential, so I'd rather leave those in
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -122,16 +127,16 @@ if $linux; then
     for var in $CONSOLIDATED_OPTS
     do
        # Remove quotes
-       p=$(echo $var | tr -d "'")
+       p=$(echo "$var" | tr -d "'")
        case $p in
-         -Dinfinispan.server.base.dir=*)

@@ -167,65 +172,65 @@ if $darwin || $freebsd || $other ; then
     for var in $CONSOLIDATED_OPTS
     do
        # Remove quotes
-       p=$(echo $var | tr -d "'")
+       p=$(echo "$var" | tr -d "'")
        case $p in
-         -Dinfinispan.server.base.dir=*)
-              ISPN_BASE_DIR=$(cd ${p#*=} ; pwd -P)
+         -Dinfinispan.server.root.path=*|--server-root=*)
+              ISPN_ROOT_DIR=$(cd "${p#*=}" ; pwd -P)
               ;;
-         -Dinfinispan.server.log.dir=*)
+         -Dinfinispan.server.log.path=*)
               if [ -d "${p#*=}" ]; then
-                ISPN_LOG_DIR=$(cd ${p#*=} ; pwd -P)
+                ISPN_LOG_DIR=$(cd "${p#*=}" ; pwd -P)
              else
                 #since the specified directory doesn't exist we don't validate it
                 ISPN_LOG_DIR=${p#*=}
              fi
              ;;
-         -Dinfinispan.server.config.dir=*)
-              ISPN_CONFIG_DIR=$(cd ${p#*=} ; pwd -P)
+         -Dinfinispan.server.config.path=*)
+              ISPN_CONFIG_DIR=$(cd "${p#*=}" ; pwd -P)
               ;;
        esac
     done
 fi
 
 # determine the default base dir, if not set
-if [ "x$ISPN_BASE_DIR" = "x" ]; then
-   ISPN_BASE_DIR="$ISPN_HOME/server"
+if [ "x$ISPN_ROOT_DIR" = "x" ]; then
+   ISPN_ROOT_DIR="$ISPN_HOME/server"
 fi
 # determine the default log dir, if not set
 if [ "x$ISPN_LOG_DIR" = "x" ]; then
-   ISPN_LOG_DIR="$ISPN_BASE_DIR/log"
+   ISPN_LOG_DIR="$ISPN_ROOT_DIR/log"
 fi
 # determine the default configuration dir, if not set
 if [ "x$ISPN_CONFIG_DIR" = "x" ]; then
-   ISPN_CONFIG_DIR="$ISPN_BASE_DIR/conf"
+   ISPN_CONFIG_DIR="$ISPN_ROOT_DIR/conf"
 fi
 
 # For Cygwin, switch paths to Windows format before running java
 if $cygwin; then
     ISPN_HOME=$(cygpath --path --windows "$ISPN_HOME")
     JAVA_HOME=$(cygpath --path --windows "$JAVA_HOME")
     ISPN_MODULEPATH=$(cygpath --path --windows "$ISPN_MODULEPATH")
